statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{7.00} cm and height \displaystyle{4.00} cm. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{5.00} cm and \displaystyle{5.66} cm.
What is the area of the shaded, inscribed triangle? cm²
What is the area of the rectangle? cm²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? cm²
